p.k: Drama France, Georgia (2014). Hrají: Sergo Buiglishvili, Anuka Grigolia, Nita Kalichava. Režie: Tinatin Kajrishvili.
p.d: Nutsa lives with her two small children in suburb of Tblissi, Georgia. With her Goga, they would bee today a regular family if he hadn't been arrested. Between the wedding in prison and the monthly visits, a routine sets in. Wil they be able to overcome this double reality?
